keyword: how many calories in a kit kat candy bar
title: How Many Calories in a Kit Kat Candy Bar?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a kit kat candy bar, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, and simple tweaks for variations.
h1: How Many Calories in a Kit Kat Candy Bar?
assumptions: Standard 4-finger Kit Kat bar (42 g), milk chocolate with crispy wafer filling, no customizations.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by size, flavor, manufacturer, and regional recipes. Check packaging for exact values.

quick_answer.text: A standard Kit Kat candy bar contains about 210 calories and 25 g of carbs.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

faqs.q: How many calories in a standard Kit Kat bar?
faqs.a: About 210 calories for a 42 g 4-finger bar.

faqs.q: What are the carbs and sugars in a Kit Kat candy bar?
faqs.a: 25 g total carbs, including 21 g sugars and 1 g fiber.

faqs.q: How much fat is in a Kit Kat?
faqs.a: 11 g total fat, with 7 g saturated fat per standard bar.

faqs.q: Are Kit Kats high in protein?
faqs.a: No, only about 2 g protein per barâ€”mostly from the wafer and chocolate.

faqs.q: Does Kit Kat size affect calories?
faqs.a: Yes; mini versions have fewer (~70 kcal), king size more (~380 kcal).
